CS2 Jailbreak
post_body:
Hey!   
I know most of you guys might be familiar with Jailbreak and how it used to popping back in and I have seen some posts saying that it is dead. Well, it's still active! There is a small community server called eGO (Used to be bigger back in the day) It gets up to 30-40 people in prime time, but otherwise it's pretty dead. Just making this post to see if some people wanna play JB and make it fun again ;)  
IP: connect [jb.edgm.rs](http://jb.edgm.rs)

post_title: How the casters from the different countries reacted to donkâ€˜s 1v5 clutch vs Heroic in Shanghai
Faze -broky +m0nesy
post_body:
I haven't seen anyone discussing this possible transfer and i dunno why, it looks great imo.

For Faze:

1. m0nesy's contract expires, so he is free 

2. m0nesy > broky, also he is younger

3. Faze is in crisis rn and it seems like they need some changes

For m0nesy:

1. G2 lost their star rifler, so their future is uncertain

2. Falcons is a clown org

3. Faze is ability to play with one of the best IGLs in history of CS and to have a consistent roster and results.

It seems like the best move for both sides. Thoughts?

post_title: CS2 suddenly started crashing, please help :(
post_body:
**Hello, I'm coming with an unusual problem that occurred to me yesterday in CS2. Namely, the whole problem is that after playing it for some time, it suddenly freezes permanently. The game image starts flashing and then goes black and I can't do anything else except close the game from the task manager and restart it. The things I've already tried to do are:**

**- File integrity**

**- Reinstall the game (cleanly and on a second disk)**

**- Resetting settings, either in Nvidia or CS2, to the initial state, i.e. default**

**- Re-updated graphics card drivers**

**- Cleaning CS files to zero**

**- Various startup commands like**

**-vulcan and etc.**

**- Disabling all programs in the background**

**And probably something else, but I don't remember it anymore. But none of the above solutions or attempts to fix the game help. Do you have any ideas, because my only solution at the moment is to completely format the system to 0...**

Graphics card: RTX 3060 TI

Processor: i5-11400F

Operating system: windows 11

post_title: What do you need to train to have the spray control of a faceit lvl 10 player?
post_body:
Just watched some faceil lvl 10 gameplay and I'm completely mind blown by how crisp and accurate and controlled their sprays are and it made me wonder, what do you need to train to become that good at spraying?
Just spamming recoil master everyday?

post_title: Placebo or not?
post_body:
Whys FACEIT feeling so smooth and Premier so dull?!

Is it placebo or theres something different between the two?I've never been a fan of 3rd party clients and stuff that makes you play out of CS, but after Premier is full of cheeters and  MM simply matches random people not based on any elo or ranks, I decided to give it a try fully.

Played some Faceit matches back when game was still CS:GO and some in early CS2 state after it got released, but never used to like it.

Started playing Faceit 2 now and it feels very smooth, people are nice, communicating, giving info and not flaming if someone fails, but encouraging him...Hitreg works good, game is fine.Why can't Premier be like that?!

post_title: Danger Zone Turns 5 years old today:  A  DZ tribute video. I miss it dearly.
What ping is unplayable in your opinion?
post_body:
As someone from Central Asia, I haven't experienced ping lower than 50 ms on official MM servers. I find it completely fine and notice issues starting at ~80-90, still playable though. 
I've seen people arguing that 40 is considered to be high.
